Question
========
In a study on school enjoyment, grade 7 students (104 girls and 97 boys) from a number of elementary school were presented with a questionnaire containing 8 questions measuring school enjoyment (or lack thereof). An analysis of variance was used to determine whether boys and girls differ in school enjoyment. Tested with $\alpha$ = 5%. What is the critical value when performing this test?

* 1.96
* 3.89
* 6.76
